name: Zig-Zag
overview: Zig Zag is 3D arcade game, different than isometric Zig Zag from Mirrorsoft. Action - in first person perspective and turnovers at 90 degrees- takes place in special maze, the player must search and destroy Scarabaqs to restore data, and avoid patrolling HOVERDROIDS. If he restore all data - he'll move to next sector - game has six sectors.
